posts.title: Email Attachments
posts.contents:
Moo.do is now a fully functional email client! Todayâ€™s release brings many bugfixes along with two major email features. You can attach files to an email by dragging a file onto an email from a Google Drive pane or from your computer.

The new Snooze menu makes it easy to quickly select a time, or you can type any date you want.

In Development

  • Gmail
    • Unsubscribe button
    • Multiple accounts
